channel.title: Comments for page "Mister Tea Lvl. 3"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Mister Tea Lvl. 3"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: It's more about the fact that he still gives a stamina bonus for quests and his teamup helps with Raids and Invasions. Most people who pick Tea don't have any Kaiju bashing left to do, or are kage's and don't need to.

item.title: Usefullness
item.content:encoded: Is his Trade ability so valuable someone would pick him over Strawberry lvl 3 ( for Strawberry Sundae Team) ?
